words.definition: An aim is a goal or something you want to do.
words.example: My aim is to become a doctor.

words.definition: To attach something is to put it together with something else.
words.example: I attached the photo to the email.

words.definition: To bet is to risk money on the result of a game or event.
words.example: I bet my brother that I would win the race.

words.definition: A carriage is a vehicle pulled by a horse.
words.example: The king and queen rode in a golden carriage.

words.definition: If something is classic, it is typical or has been popular for a long time.
words.example: I enjoy reading classic novels.

words.definition: To commute is to travel a long distance to get to work.
words.example: He commutes to the city by train every day.

words.definition: To confirm is to say that something is definitely true.
words.example: The doctor confirmed that the girl was healthy.

words.definition: To criticize is to say what is wrong with something or someone.
words.example: He criticized my choice of clothes.

words.definition: To differ is to be different from something else.
words.example: The two brothers differ in many ways.

words.definition: An expense is the money that you spend on something.
words.example: The expense of the trip was more than I expected.

words.definition: If something is formal, it is done in an official or serious way.
words.example: It was a formal dinner, so I wore a suit.

words.definition: Height is how tall someone or something is.
words.example: The wall was three meters in height.

words.definition: To invent is to create something for the first time.
words.example: Thomas Edison invented the light bulb.

words.definition: If someone is junior, they have a low rank in an organization.
words.example: He is a junior doctor at the hospital.

words.definition: Labor is hard work, usually physical work.
words.example: Building the house required a lot of labor.

words.definition: A mechanic is someone who fixes machines or cars.
words.example: The mechanic fixed my car's engine.

words.definition: If something is prime, it is the most important or of the best quality.
words.example: The prime reason for his success was hard work.

words.definition: A shift is a period of time when people work.
words.example: I worked the night shift at the hospital.

words.definition: A signal is a sound or action that gives a message.
words.example: The whistle was a signal for the game to start.

words.definition: When people are sincere, they tell the truth and mean what they say.
words.example: He gave me a sincere apology.
